Posts.Content: Hi Pauline, Go for the chemo you have to give yourself the best fighting chance to beat this. Im currently being treated with FEC X 3 which is copable at the moment  & then it will be followed by TAX x 3 20 x rads and Herceptin.    Take care Beccy xx
Posts.Title: I am borderline Chemo - should I go for it?

Posts.Content: Hi Kath, I do know of 1 other person who tried the cold cap she kept about 30% of her hair. I personally havent bothered as you have to sit in hospital for sometime after chemo has been given and it can be painful. II just wanted the drugs and run if you get my gist. How did you get on with the oncologist today? Beccy x
Posts.Title: swollen breast

Posts.Content: Hi Kath, I had a lumpectomy with 4 nodes removed towards the end of Feb this year. I am still getting swelling on & off and a pulling feeling around the area where the lump was removed. I havent had any infection but my scar feels lumpy my oncologist checked it out and said it was fine guess its just all part of the healing process? Have you seen your oncologist yet?   Beccy
